Class AttackAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.AttackAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class AttackAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    Special Action that allows the Actor to attack other Actors.
    Author:
    weijianlai

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Check if the Actor is able to perform the attack by doing the probability check. It will call the punch attack method if it meets the probability check. This allows any actor that has the ability to attack to perform the attack action check here which means that either Player or Zombie. It will also calls the AmputatedArms, AmputatedLegs and DropZombieParts methods when the attack is successful that hits the Zombie.
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - The map the actor is on.
        Returns:
        a description of what happened that can be displayed to the user.

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        Description copied from class: edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Returns a descriptive string

      • punchAttack

        public java.lang.String punchAttack(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon,
                                    int damage)
        Damage the target Actor and check if the subject is still conscious. If the subject is no longer conscious, it will then create an Item % to represent the dead body of the subject and drops all Items in the subjects inventory. Then, it passes all Skills from the Actor to the dead. It will also check if the unconcscious target is a Human, if it's Human, it will create a corpse instead that will turn into a zombie after 5-10 turns.
        Parameters:
        actor - The attacking Actor
        map - The game map in which the actor is in
        weapon - the weapon the actor is using
        damage - the total damage dealt in Integer
        Returns:
        A string displaying the damage dealt or the target is killed.

      • biteAttack

        public java.lang.String biteAttack(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                   edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                   int damage)
        Damage the target Actor with bite attack and check if the subject is still conscious. If the subject is no longer conscious, it will then create an Item % to represent the dead body of the subject and drops all Items in the subjects inventory. Then, it passes all Skills from the Actor to the dead. It will also check if the unconcscious target is a Human, if it's Human, it will create a corpse instead that will turn into a zombie after 5-10 turns.
        Parameters:
        actor - The attacking Actor
        map - The game map in which the actor is in
        damage - the total damage dealt in Integer
        Returns:
        A string displaying the damage dealt or the target is killed.

      • isKilled

        public java.lang.String isKilled(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                 java.lang.String result)

      • amputatedArms

        public java.lang.String amputatedArms(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Decrease the chance of zombie's normal punch attack by half by cutting off one of the zombie arms. It will drop the zombie arm at the player's location so that player will have the options to pick the zombie arms up. It will also check if all the two zombie arms are cut, then it will lose the ability to attack and drop every weapon it's holding.
        Parameters:
        map - The gamemap in which the actor in
        Returns:
        String showing the Zombie's Arms are dropped

      • drop_zombie_parts

        public void drop_zombie_parts(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                              edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item item)
        A function that checks for the lists of exit where the zombie parts can be dropped. It will check if the location does not contain an actor and is a Dirt before dropping the parts.
        Parameters:
        map - the map in which the actor is in
        item - the item to be dropped in the map
